verses.text: The \w word|strong="H1697"\w* that came to \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* from the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

Thus \w speaketh|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Write|strong="H3789"\w* thee all the \w words|strong="H1697"\w* that I have \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* unto thee in a \w book|strong="H5612"\w*.

For, lo, the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, that I will bring \w again|strong="H7725"\w* the \w captivity|strong="H7622"\w* of my \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* and \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*: and I will cause them to \w return|strong="H7725"\w* to the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* that I \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* to their \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, and they shall \w possess|strong="H3423"\w* it.

¶ And these \add are\add* the \w words|strong="H1697"\w* that the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* concerning \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* and concerning \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*.

For thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; We have \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* a \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* of \w trembling|strong="H2731"\w*, of \w fear|strong="H6343"\w*, and not of \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*.\f + \fr 30.5 \ft of fear…: or, there is fear, and not peace\f*

\w Ask|strong="H7592"\w* ye now, and \w see|strong="H7200"\w* whether a \w man|strong="H2145"\w* doth travail with \w child|strong="H3205"\w*? wherefore do I \w see|strong="H7200"\w* every \w man|strong="H1397"\w* with his \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* on his \w loins|strong="H2504"\w*, as a woman in \w travail|strong="H3205"\w*, and all \w faces|strong="H6440"\w* are \w turned|strong="H2015"\w* into \w paleness|strong="H3420"\w*?\f + \fr 30.6 \ft a man: Heb. a male\f*

\w Alas|strong="H1945"\w*! for that \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \add is\add* \w great|strong="H1419"\w*, so \w that|strong="H0369"\w* none \add is\add* like it: it \add is\add* even the \w time|strong="H6256"\w* of \w Jacob’s|strong="H3290"\w* \w trouble|strong="H6869"\w*; but he shall be \w saved|strong="H3467"\w* out of it.

For it shall come to pass in that \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, \add that\add* I will \w break|strong="H7665"\w* his \w yoke|strong="H5923"\w* from off thy \w neck|strong="H6677"\w*, and will \w burst|strong="H5423"\w* thy \w bonds|strong="H4147"\w*, and \w strangers|strong="H2114"\w* shall no more \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* themselves of him:

But they shall \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* their \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, and \w David|strong="H1732"\w* their \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, whom I will raise \w up|strong="H6965"\w* unto them.

¶ Therefore \w fear|strong="H3372"\w* thou not, O my \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; neither be \w dismayed|strong="H2865"\w*, O \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: for, lo, I will \w save|strong="H3467"\w* thee from \w afar|strong="H7350"\w*, and thy \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* from the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of their \w captivity|strong="H7628"\w*; and \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* shall \w return|strong="H7725"\w*, and shall be in \w rest|strong="H8252"\w*, and be \w quiet|strong="H7599"\w*, and none shall make \add him\add* \w afraid|strong="H2729"\w*.

For I \add am\add* with thee, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, to \w save|strong="H3467"\w* thee: though I \w make|strong="H6213"\w* a full \w end|strong="H3617"\w* of all \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* whither I have \w scattered|strong="H6327"\w* thee, yet will I not \w make|strong="H6213"\w* a full \w end|strong="H3617"\w* of thee: but I will \w correct|strong="H3256"\w* thee in \w measure|strong="H4941"\w*, and will not leave thee \w altogether|strong="H5352"\w* \w unpunished|strong="H5352"\w*.

For thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, Thy \w bruise|strong="H7667"\w* \add is\add* \w incurable|strong="H0605"\w*, \add and\add* thy \w wound|strong="H4347"\w* \add is\add* \w grievous|strong="H2470"\w*.

\add There is\add* none to \w plead|strong="H1777"\w* thy \w cause|strong="H1779"\w*, that thou mayest be bound \w up|strong="H4205"\w*: thou hast no \w healing|strong="H8585"\w* \w medicines|strong="H7499"\w*.\f + \fr 30.13 \ft that…: Heb. for binding up, or, pressing\f*

All thy \w lovers|strong="H0157"\w* have \w forgotten|strong="H7911"\w* thee; they \w seek|strong="H1875"\w* thee not; for I have \w wounded|strong="H5221"\w* thee with the \w wound|strong="H4347"\w* of an \w enemy|strong="H0341"\w*, with the \w chastisement|strong="H4148"\w* of a cruel \w one|strong="H0394"\w*, for the \w multitude|strong="H7230"\w* of thine \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w*; \add because\add* thy \w sins|strong="H2403"\w* were \w increased|strong="H6105"\w*.

Why \w criest|strong="H2199"\w* thou for thine \w affliction|strong="H7667"\w*? thy \w sorrow|strong="H4341"\w* \add is\add* \w incurable|strong="H0605"\w* for the \w multitude|strong="H7230"\w* of thine \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w*: \add because\add* thy \w sins|strong="H2403"\w* were \w increased|strong="H6105"\w*, I have \w done|strong="H6213"\w* these things unto thee.

Therefore all they that \w devour|strong="H0398"\w* thee shall be \w devoured|strong="H0398"\w*; and all thine \w adversaries|strong="H6862"\w*, every one of them, shall \w go|strong="H3212"\w* into \w captivity|strong="H7628"\w*; and they that \w spoil|strong="H7601"\w* thee shall be a \w spoil|strong="H4933"\w*, and all that \w prey|strong="H0962"\w* upon thee will I \w give|strong="H5414"\w* for a \w prey|strong="H0957"\w*.

For I will \w restore|strong="H5927"\w* \w health|strong="H0724"\w* unto thee, and I will \w heal|strong="H7495"\w* thee of thy \w wounds|strong="H4347"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; because they \w called|strong="H7121"\w* thee an \w Outcast|strong="H5080"\w*, \add saying\add*, This \add is\add* \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*, whom no man seeketh \w after|strong="H1875"\w*.

¶ Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; Behold, I will bring \w again|strong="H7725"\w* the \w captivity|strong="H7622"\w* of \w Jacob’s|strong="H3290"\w* \w tents|strong="H0168"\w*, and have \w mercy|strong="H7355"\w* on his \w dwellingplaces|strong="H4908"\w*; and the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* shall be \w builded|strong="H1129"\w* upon her own \w heap|strong="H8510"\w*, and the \w palace|strong="H0759"\w* shall \w remain|strong="H3427"\w* after the \w manner|strong="H4941"\w* thereof.\f + \fr 30.18 \ft heap: or, little hill\f*

And out of them shall \w proceed|strong="H3318"\w* \w thanksgiving|strong="H8426"\w* and the \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* of them that make \w merry|strong="H7832"\w*: and I will \w multiply|strong="H7235"\w* them, and they shall not be \w few|strong="H4591"\w*; I will also \w glorify|strong="H3513"\w* them, and they shall not be \w small|strong="H6819"\w*.

Their \w children|strong="H1121"\w* also shall be as \w aforetime|strong="H6924"\w*, and their \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w* shall be \w established|strong="H3559"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* me, and I will \w punish|strong="H6485"\w* all that \w oppress|strong="H3905"\w* them.

And their \w nobles|strong="H0117"\w* shall be of themselves, and their \w governor|strong="H4910"\w* shall \w proceed|strong="H3318"\w* from the \w midst|strong="H7130"\w* of them; and I will cause him to draw \w near|strong="H7126"\w*, and he shall \w approach|strong="H5066"\w* unto me: for who \add is\add* this that \w engaged|strong="H6148"\w* his \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* to \w approach|strong="H5066"\w* unto me? \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.
And ye shall be my \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, and I will be your \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

Behold, the \w whirlwind|strong="H5591"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* goeth \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* with \w fury|strong="H2534"\w*, a \w continuing|strong="H1641"\w* \w whirlwind|strong="H5591"\w*: it shall fall with \w pain|strong="H2342"\w* upon the \w head|strong="H7218"\w* of the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w*.\f + \fr 30.23 \ft continuing: Heb. cutting\f*\f + \fr 30.23 \ft fall…: or, remain\f*

The \w fierce|strong="H2740"\w* \w anger|strong="H0639"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* shall not \w return|strong="H7725"\w*, until he have \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \add it\add*, and until he have \w performed|strong="H6965"\w* the \w intents|strong="H4209"\w* of his \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*: in the \w latter|strong="H0319"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* ye shall \w consider|strong="H0995"\w* it.
